javamoon.construct.binary.binaryfile
Class BinaryFile

java.lang.Object
  javamoon.construct.binary.binaryfile.BinaryFile
Direct Known Subclasses:
ClassFile, JavaArchiveFile, NullFile
public abstract class BinaryFile
extends java.lang.Object

Binary file, basically in Java we can have two kinds:

  • .class files
  • .jar files (as a set or class files).

    • Since:
    JavaMoon-2.0
    Author:
    Raúl Marticorena
